name: Joanna Angel
description:
Will Jewish parents ever be satisfied?

Take the parents of the — ahem — talented Joanna Angel. She is a college graduate, a successful woman with her own business. She has a large international following, and is considered a pioneer in her — ahem — industry. All this before she turned 30.

Sounds terrific, right?

Well, sure, but... Well, when relatives start to turn away from you because of your daughter's chosen profession, when you must defend your daughter's lifestyle to all comers, when you thank the stars that your other two daughters have mainstream careers... it can get tiring.

For Joanna is a — ahem — porn star, who not only took home an Adult Video award for best sex scene for — ahem — "Re-Penetrator", but is also at the forefront of alt porn, a subset of the industry catering to goths, punks, and ravers.

And yes, her parents love her, and yes, her parents support her, but honey... are you sure this is what you want to do with her life?

Well, Joanna thinks that there is a way for her parents to forgive her. What will it take? Marrying someone Jewish, of course.

Oh, the lot of Jewish parents...
